verses.roman:
govardhane caḍi' kṛṣṇa bājāilā veṇu
govardhanera caudike care saba dhenu

synonyms: govardhane—on Govardhana Hill; caḍi'-going up; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; bājāilā veṇu—played the flute; govardhanera—of Govardhana Hill; cau-dike—in four directions; care—graze; saba—all; dhenu—cows.
translation: "I saw Lord Kṛṣṇa climbing Govardhana Hill and playing His flute, surrounded on all sides by grazing cows.
